title: Kem Nám Chân - Brightening Corector Cream
description: Điều trị nám chân gốc rễ, kích thích tuần hoàn, phục hồi sắc tố melanin, làm sáng da, đều màu chỉ sau 2 tuần. Sản phẩm sử dụng công nghệ phân tử tiên tiến, mang lại hiệu quả gấp 3-5 lần so với phương pháp thông thường.
description2: Được tổng hợp từ 92% thành phần có nguồn gốc tự nhiên

comments.name: Ngọc Lan, Chủ Spa Mai Lan
comments.text: LUMIA là thương hiệu mà chúng tôi luôn tin tưởng và lựa chọn cho spa của mình. Sản phẩm của họ giúp chúng tôi mang lại hiệu quả rõ rệt cho khách hàng, đặc biệt là trong việc điều trị nám và làm sáng da. Công nghệ Postbiotic 99% giúp khách hàng cảm thấy sự khác biệt ngay từ lần đầu sử dụng. Chắc chắn chúng tôi sẽ tiếp tục hợp tác lâu dài với LUMIA.

comments.name: Hồng Nhung, Chủ Spa Nhung’s Beauty
comments.text: Với các dòng sản phẩm chăm sóc da của LUMIA, khách hàng của chúng tôi không chỉ hài lòng về hiệu quả mà còn an tâm về độ an toàn. Các sản phẩm dưỡng da khoa học và tiên tiến, đặc biệt là kem dưỡng tái tạo Brightening and Regenerating Cream, luôn được khách hàng yêu thích. Chúng tôi rất vui khi có thể mang lại dịch vụ chăm sóc da chuẩn Hàn Quốc cho khách hàng tại spa của mình.

comments.name: Tuấn Anh, Chủ Spa Tuấn Anh Luxury Spa
comments.text: LUMIA giúp spa của chúng tôi nâng tầm chất lượng dịch vụ. Những sản phẩm như serum và ampoule của họ không chỉ mang lại kết quả điều trị hiệu quả mà còn giúp chúng tôi tiết kiệm thời gian và chi phí trong việc tìm kiếm sản phẩm phù hợp. Khách hàng luôn hài lòng và tin tưởng vào liệu trình chăm sóc da tại spa của chúng tôi.

comments.name: Kim Lan, Chủ Spa Kim Lan Beauty
comments.text: Sản phẩm của LUMIA thật sự làm chúng tôi ấn tượng ngay từ lần đầu sử dụng. Với các dòng kem dưỡng và serum giúp phục hồi da, khách hàng của chúng tôi đã thấy sự cải thiện rõ rệt về độ sáng mịn và đàn hồi của da. Công nghệ Postbiotic 99% là một yếu tố quan trọng giúp sản phẩm đạt được hiệu quả tuyệt vời. Đây chính là lựa chọn lý tưởng cho các spa muốn cung cấp dịch vụ chăm sóc da cao cấp.

comments.name: Thanh Tú, Chủ Spa Thanh Tú Exclusive
comments.text: Chúng tôi đã thử nghiệm sản phẩm LUMIA trong nhiều tháng và kết quả thật sự ấn tượng. Các sản phẩm như LUMIA Whitening Ampoule và Cell Active Age Renewal Serum giúp cải thiện sắc tố da và làm sáng da hiệu quả. Khách hàng phản hồi rất tích cực về độ hiệu quả và cảm giác mềm mại, tươi mới sau mỗi liệu trình. Chắc chắn LUMIA sẽ là sản phẩm chủ lực tại spa của chúng tôi.

tabContentData.title: Đặc điểm nổi bật
tabContentData.content: Điều trị nám chân gốc rễ, kích thích tuần hoàn, phục hồi sắc tố melanin, làm sáng da, đều màu chỉ sau 2 tuần. Sản phẩm sử dụng công nghệ phân tử tiên tiến, mang lại hiệu quả gấp 3-5 lần so với phương pháp thông thường.

tabContentData.title: Lợi Ích
tabContentData.content: Kem trị nám chân sâu với Alpha Arbutin, Acid Ascorbic và Glutathione giúp ức chế sự hình thành melanin, làm mờ nám chân sâu, tàn nhang, đốm nâu, mang lại làn da sáng mịn và đều màu. Công thức giàu chất chống oxy hóa giúp tái tạo tế bào, bảo vệ da khỏi tác nhân gây hại, dưỡng ẩm, và cải thiện độ đàn hồi.

tabContentData.title: Thành Phần
tabContentData.content: Thành phần: Alpha Arbutin, Acid Ascorbic, Glutathione

tabContentData.title: Lý do lựa chọn
tabContentData.content: Phù hợp cho mọi loại da, kể cả da yếu hoặc đã bị tổn thương, giúp da khỏe mạnh và giảm thiểu nám tái phát.

tabContentData.title: Xuất xứ
tabContentData.content: Sản phẩm chăm sóc da Hàn Quốc, phát triển với công nghệ tiên tiến và được kiểm nghiệm qua các nghiên cứu lâm sàng.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: Apply 2-3 pumps of serum onto cleansed skin. Gently pat the serum into your face and neck using upward motions. Allow to fully absorb before applying moisturizer. For best results, use morning and evening as part of your skincare routine.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Product Is Suitable For Most Skin Types, Including Normal, Oily, Dry, And Combination Skin. However, If You Have Sensitive Skin Or A Skin Condition, We Recommend Performing A Patch Test Before Using The Product All Over Your Face. Apply A Small Amount Of The Product To The Inside Of Your Elbow And Wait 24 Hours To Make Sure You Do Not Have An Allergic Reaction Or Irritation. If You Experience Any Discomfort, Discontinue Use Of The Product Immediately.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. Apply after cleansing and toning, but before moisturizing. If you have sensitive skin, you may want to start with once daily application and gradually increase as your skin adjusts.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: While our product contains ingredients that are generally considered safe, we always recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before using any skincare products during pregnancy or while breastfeeding, as individual circumstances may vary.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. Apply after cleansing and toning, but before moisturizing. If you have sensitive skin, you may want to start with once daily application and gradually increase as your skin adjusts.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly closed when not in use. Do not expose to extreme temperatures. For maximum potency, we recommend using the product within 12 months after opening.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users notice initial improvements in skin texture and hydration within 1-2 weeks of consistent use. More significant results, such as reduction in fine lines and improved firmness, typically become visible after 4-6 weeks of regular application. Individual results may vary depending on skin type and condition.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our product is formulated to work well with most skincare routines. It can be layered with other products, but we recommend applying from thinnest to thickest consistency. Allow each product to fully absorb before applying the next. If using with active ingredients like retinol or vitamin C, you may want to alternate usage times to prevent potential irritation.

title: Kem Nám Mảng - Brightening And Regenerating Cream
description: Cải thiện tình trạng da không đều màu, mang lại làn da săn chắc, mịn màng và tươi sáng. Công thức kết hợp Pakuchiol, Glycolic Acid, và Retinol giúp tăng cường tái tạo da và bảo vệ da khỏi tác nhân gây hại.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: Apply 2-3 pumps of product onto cleansed skin. Gently pat the cream into your face and neck using upward motions. Use in the evening after cleansing and toning. For best results, follow with a moisturizer. In the morning, always apply sunscreen as the product may increase sensitivity to sunlight.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Product Is Suitable For Most Skin Types, Including Normal, Oily, Dry, And Combination Skin. However, If You Have Sensitive Skin Or A Skin Condition, We Recommend Performing A Patch Test Before Using The Product All Over Your Face. Apply A Small Amount Of The Product To The Inside Of Your Elbow And Wait 24 Hours To Make Sure You Do Not Have An Allergic Reaction Or Irritation. If You Experience Any Discomfort, Discontinue Use Of The Product Immediately.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product once daily, preferably in the evening skincare routine. If you have resilient skin, you may increase to twice daily after two weeks of use. Always monitor your skin's response and adjust usage accordingly.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: Due to the presence of Retinol in this product, we do not recommend using it during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. Please consult with your healthcare provider for suitable alternatives during this time.

faqItems.question: How long will the product last?
faqItems.answer: With regular use as directed (once daily application), a 50ml jar typically lasts approximately 2-3 months, depending on the amount used per application.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly closed when not in use. Do not expose to extreme temperatures. For maximum potency, we recommend using the product within 12 months after opening.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users notice initial improvements in skin texture and brightness within 2-3 weeks of consistent use. More significant results in hyperpigmentation reduction and skin tone evening typically become visible after 4-8 weeks. For optimal results, consistent use for at least 12 weeks is recommended.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our product is formulated to work well with most skincare routines. However, we recommend avoiding using it simultaneously with other products containing high concentrations of AHAs, BHAs, or other retinoids to prevent potential irritation. Allow each product to fully absorb before applying the next. If using with vitamin C products, separate their application times (e.g., vitamin C in the morning, our product in the evening).

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: Apply 3-5 drops of the serum onto cleansed and toned skin. Gently pat and press the serum into your skin until fully absorbed. Use twice daily, morning and evening. For best results, follow with a moisturizer and sunscreen (during daytime use).

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Dark Spot Serum is specifically formulated for post-treatment skin and those with hyperpigmentation concerns. It's suitable for normal, combination, and dry skin types. For sensitive or compromised skin, we recommend patch testing first and consulting with your dermatologist, especially if you've recently undergone invasive skin treatments.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, apply the serum twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. If you're using it immediately after a laser treatment or chemical peel, follow your skincare professional's advice, which may include waiting 24-48 hours post-procedure before application.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: Due to the presence of certain active ingredients like Tranexamic Acid, we recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before using this product during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. Your doctor can provide personalized advice based on your specific situation.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, apply the serum twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. If you're using it immediately after a laser treatment or chemical peel, follow your skincare professional's advice, which may include waiting 24-48 hours post-procedure before application.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. The dark glass bottle helps preserve the potency of the active ingredients, but additional protection from heat and light is recommended. Keep tightly closed when not in use and store at temperatures below 25°C (77°F).

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Initial improvements in skin texture and hydration are typically noticed within 1-2 weeks. Visible reduction in dark spots and hyperpigmentation usually begins after 3-4 weeks of consistent use. Significant results for post-treatment skin recovery are generally observed after 6-8 weeks of regular application. Individual results may vary depending on skin condition and severity of concerns.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our Dark Spot Serum is designed to complement other skincare products. However, we recommend avoiding simultaneous use with products containing high concentrations of vitamin C, AHAs, or BHAs to prevent potential irritation. If you wish to use these ingredients, consider alternating them (e.g., vitamin C in the morning, our serum in the evening). Always allow each product to fully absorb before applying the next.

title: Sữa Dưỡng - Rejuvenating Essential Emulsion

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: Apply a moderate amount of the emulsion to your face and neck after cleansing and toning. Gently pat the product into your skin until fully absorbed. Use morning and evening for best results. This product works well as part of your hydration routine before applying heavier creams or oils.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Rejuvenating Essential Emulsion is formulated to be suitable for all skin types, particularly beneficial for dehydrated, dull, and uneven skin tones. The lightweight formula makes it appropriate for combination and oily skin, while the hydrating properties benefit dry skin types as well.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily, morning and evening. Consistent application will help maintain skin hydration levels and enhance the brightening and protective benefits of the formula.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: The ingredients in our Rejuvenating Essential Emulsion are generally considered safe during pregnancy. However, as individual sensitivities can vary, we recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before incorporating any new skincare products into your routine during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily, morning and evening. Consistent application will help maintain skin hydration levels and enhance the brightening and protective benefits of the formula.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly closed when not in use. Do not expose to extreme temperatures. For maximum potency, we recommend using the product within 12 months after opening.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users notice immediate improvements in skin hydration and texture. More significant results in skin brightness and evenness typically become visible after 2-3 weeks of consistent use. For optimal results with reduction of dark spots and overall skin tone improvement, consistent use for 4-6 weeks is recommended.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our Rejuvenating Essential Emulsion is designed to work harmoniously within your skincare routine. It should be applied after cleansing and toning, but before heavier serums, creams, and oils. The formulation is compatible with most active ingredients, including vitamin C, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid products.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: Apply 3-4 drops of the essence onto clean, slightly damp skin. Gently pat and press the product into your skin with your fingertips until fully absorbed. Use twice daily, morning and evening, after cleansing and toning. For enhanced results, follow with your regular moisturizer.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Red Ginseng Essence is specifically formulated for sensitive, irritated, and reactive skin types. The anti-inflammatory properties of Korean Red Ginseng make it particularly beneficial for skin that is prone to redness, irritation, or recovering from treatments or environmental stress.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily, morning and evening. During periods of increased skin sensitivity or after treatments, you may increase usage to 3 times daily to help expedite the healing and recovery process.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: The ingredients in our Red Ginseng Essence are generally considered safe for use during pregnancy. However, as individual sensitivities may vary, we always recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before incorporating any new skincare products into your routine during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily, morning and evening. During periods of increased skin sensitivity or after treatments, you may increase usage to 3 times daily to help expedite the healing and recovery process.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. The dark amber bottle helps protect the active ingredients from light degradation. Keep tightly closed when not in use. For an extra soothing effect, you may refrigerate the product, which can enhance its calming properties when applied.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users experience immediate soothing effects and reduction in redness upon application. Consistent improvement in skin texture and resilience typically becomes noticeable within 1-2 weeks of regular use. Long-term benefits in skin barrier function and elasticity generally develop after 4-6 weeks of continued application.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our Red Ginseng Essence is designed to complement your existing skincare routine. It works particularly well with gentle, non-irritating products. However, when using with active ingredients like AHAs, BHAs, or retinoids, we recommend applying the essence first to help buffer potential irritation. For sensitized skin, consider temporarily reducing use of potentially irritating actives while focusing on repair with our essence.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: For the Day Cream: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean, dry skin in the morning. Gently massage in circular motions until fully absorbed. Follow with sunscreen for optimal protection. For the Night Cream: After cleansing and applying any treatment serums in the evening, apply a small amount to face and neck. Massage using upward motions until absorbed. For best results, use consistently as part of your morning and evening routines.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Anti-Aging Day/Night Cream duo is formulated to be suitable for most skin types, particularly beneficial for mature skin, skin with hyperpigmentation, and those concerned with prevention of early signs of aging. The formulation is non-comedogenic and suitable for normal, combination, and dry skin types. Those with very oily or acne-prone skin may prefer to use a lighter amount of the product.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, the Day Cream should be used every morning and the Night Cream every evening. Consistent daily use of both products as part of your skincare routine will provide the most noticeable improvement in skin tone, texture, and overall appearance.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: Some ingredients in our Anti-Aging Day/Night Cream, such as Tranexamic Acid, may not be recommended during pregnancy. We advise consulting with your healthcare provider before using these products if you are pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or breastfeeding.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, the Day Cream should be used every morning and the Night Cream every evening. Consistent daily use of both products as part of your skincare routine will provide the most noticeable improvement in skin tone, texture, and overall appearance.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store both creams in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep containers tightly closed when not in use. Do not expose to extreme temperatures. For optimal potency and effectiveness, we recommend using the products within 12 months after opening.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users notice improvements in skin hydration and texture within the first week of consistent use. More visible results in reducing hyperpigmentation and fine lines typically become apparent after 4-6 weeks. Significant improvements in skin tone evenness, firmness, and overall appearance generally develop after 8-12 weeks of regular, twice-daily application.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our Anti-Aging Day/Night Cream duo is designed to work well within a comprehensive skincare routine. They can be used alongside cleansers, toners, and targeted treatment serums. For the Day Cream, apply before sunscreen in your morning routine. For the Night Cream, apply after any treatment serums in your evening routine. If using with retinol or other potent actives, you may want to alternate nights or consult with a skincare professional for personalized advice.

Các sản phẩm dưỡng da khoa học và tiên tiến, đặc biệt là kem dưỡng tái tạo Brightening and Regenerating Cream, luôn được khách hàng yêu thích. Chúng tôi rất vui khi có thể mang lại dịch vụ chăm sóc da chuẩn Hàn Quốc cho khách hàng tại spa của mình.

comments.text: LUMIA giúp spa của chúng tôi nâng tầm chất lượng dịch vụ. Những sản phẩm như serum và ampoule của họ không chỉ mang lại kết quả điều trị hiệu quả mà còn giúp chúng tôi tiết kiệm thời gian và chi phí trong việc tìm kiếm sản phẩm phù hợp. Khách hàng luôn hài lòng và tin tưởng vào liệu trình chăm sóc da tại spa của chúng tôi.

comments.text: Sản phẩm của LUMIA thật sự làm chúng tôi ấn tượng ngay từ lần đầu sử dụng. Với các dòng kem dưỡng và serum giúp phục hồi da, khách hàng của chúng tôi đã thấy sự cải thiện rõ rệt về độ sáng mịn và đàn hồi của da. Công nghệ Postbiotic 99% là một yếu tố quan trọng giúp sản phẩm đạt được hiệu quả tuyệt vời. Đây chính là lựa chọn lý tưởng cho các spa muốn cung cấp dịch vụ chăm sóc da cao cấp.

comments.name: Thanh Tú, Chủ Spa Thanh Tú Exclusive
comments.text: Chúng tôi đã thử nghiệm sản phẩm LUMIA trong nhiều tháng và kết quả thật sự ấn tượng. Các sản phẩm như LUMIA Whitening Ampoule và Cell Active Age Renewal Serum giúp cải thiện sắc tố da và làm sáng da hiệu quả. Khách hàng phản hồi rất tích cực về độ hiệu quả và cảm giác mềm mại, tươi mới sau mỗi liệu trình. Chắc chắn LUMIA sẽ là sản phẩm chủ lực tại spa của chúng tôi.

tabContentData.content: Giúp da sáng mịn và đều màu, cung cấp lớp bảo vệ da mạnh mẽ suốt cả ngày. Công thức chống nắng phổ rộng bảo vệ da khỏi tia UVA (PA++++) và UVB, ngăn ngừa các tác hại của ánh nắng như sạm da, nám, tàn nhang và dấu hiệu lão hóa sớm do ánh nắng gây ra.

tabContentData.title: Xuất xứ
tabContentData.preview: Sản phẩm chăm sóc da Hàn Quốc...
tabContentData.content: Sản phẩm chăm sóc da Hàn Quốc, phát triển với công nghệ tiên tiến và được kiểm nghiệm qua các nghiên cứu lâm sàng.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: Apply 2-3 pumps of serum onto cleansed skin. Gently pat the serum into your face and neck using upward motions. Allow to fully absorb before applying moisturizer. For best results, use morning and evening as part of your skincare routine.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Product Is Suitable For Most Skin Types, Including Normal, Oily, Dry, And Combination Skin. However, If You Have Sensitive Skin Or A Skin Condition, We Recommend Performing A Patch Test Before Using The Product All Over Your Face. Apply A Small Amount Of The Product To The Inside Of Your Elbow And Wait 24 Hours To Make Sure You Do Not Have An Allergic Reaction Or Irritation. If You Experience Any Discomfort, Discontinue Use Of The Product Immediately.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. Apply after cleansing and toning, but before moisturizing. If you have sensitive skin, you may want to start with once daily application and gradually increase as your skin adjusts.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: While our product contains ingredients that are generally considered safe, we always recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before using any skincare products during pregnancy or while breastfeeding, as individual circumstances may vary.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. Apply after cleansing and toning, but before moisturizing. If you have sensitive skin, you may want to start with once daily application and gradually increase as your skin adjusts.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly closed when not in use. Do not expose to extreme temperatures. For maximum potency, we recommend using the product within 12 months after opening.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users notice initial improvements in skin texture and hydration within 1-2 weeks of consistent use. More significant results, such as reduction in fine lines and improved firmness, typically become visible after 4-6 weeks of regular application. Individual results may vary depending on skin type and condition.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our product is formulated to work well with most skincare routines. It can be layered with other products, but we recommend applying from thinnest to thickest consistency. Allow each product to fully absorb before applying the next. If using with active ingredients like retinol or vitamin C, you may want to alternate usage times to prevent potential irritation.

Sản phẩm của họ giúp chúng tôi mang lại hiệu quả rõ rệt cho khách hàng, đặc biệt là trong việc điều trị nám và làm sáng da. Công nghệ Postbiotic 99% giúp khách hàng cảm thấy sự khác biệt ngay từ lần đầu sử dụng. Chắc chắn chúng tôi sẽ tiếp tục hợp tác lâu dài với LUMIA.

comments.name: Hồng Nhung, Chủ Spa Nhung’s Beauty
comments.text: Với các dòng sản phẩm chăm sóc da của LUMIA, khách hàng của chúng tôi không chỉ hài lòng về hiệu quả mà còn an tâm về độ an toàn. Các sản phẩm dưỡng da khoa học và tiên tiến, đặc biệt là kem dưỡng tái tạo Brightening and Regenerating Cream, luôn được khách hàng yêu thích. Chúng tôi rất vui khi có thể mang lại dịch vụ chăm sóc da chuẩn Hàn Quốc cho khách hàng tại spa của mình.

comments.name: Tuấn Anh, Chủ Spa Tuấn Anh Luxury Spa
comments.text: LUMIA giúp spa của chúng tôi nâng tầm chất lượng dịch vụ. Những sản phẩm như serum và ampoule của họ không chỉ mang lại kết quả điều trị hiệu quả mà còn giúp chúng tôi tiết kiệm thời gian và chi phí trong việc tìm kiếm sản phẩm phù hợp. Khách hàng luôn hài lòng và tin tưởng vào liệu trình chăm sóc da tại spa của chúng tôi.

comments.name: Kim Lan, Chủ Spa Kim Lan Beauty
comments.text: Sản phẩm của LUMIA thật sự làm chúng tôi ấn tượng ngay từ lần đầu sử dụng. Với các dòng kem dưỡng và serum giúp phục hồi da, khách hàng của chúng tôi đã thấy sự cải thiện rõ rệt về độ sáng mịn và đàn hồi của da. Công nghệ Postbiotic 99% là một yếu tố quan trọng giúp sản phẩm đạt được hiệu quả tuyệt vời. Đây chính là lựa chọn lý tưởng cho các spa muốn cung cấp dịch vụ chăm sóc da cao cấp.

comments.name: Thanh Tú, Chủ Spa Thanh Tú Exclusive
comments.text: Chúng tôi đã thử nghiệm sản phẩm LUMIA trong nhiều tháng và kết quả thật sự ấn tượng. Các sản phẩm như LUMIA Whitening Ampoule và Cell Active Age Renewal Serum giúp cải thiện sắc tố da và làm sáng da hiệu quả. Khách hàng phản hồi rất tích cực về độ hiệu quả và cảm giác mềm mại, tươi mới sau mỗi liệu trình. Chắc chắn LUMIA sẽ là sản phẩm chủ lực tại spa của chúng tôi.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: Apply 2-3 pumps of serum onto cleansed skin. Gently pat the serum into your face and neck using upward motions. Allow to fully absorb before applying moisturizer. For best results, use morning and evening as part of your skincare routine.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Product Is Suitable For Most Skin Types, Including Normal, Oily, Dry, And Combination Skin. However, If You Have Sensitive Skin Or A Skin Condition, We Recommend Performing A Patch Test Before Using The Product All Over Your Face. Apply A Small Amount Of The Product To The Inside Of Your Elbow And Wait 24 Hours To Make Sure You Do Not Have An Allergic Reaction Or Irritation. If You Experience Any Discomfort, Discontinue Use Of The Product Immediately.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. Apply after cleansing and toning, but before moisturizing. If you have sensitive skin, you may want to start with once daily application and gradually increase as your skin adjusts.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used during pregnancy?
faqItems.answer: While our product contains ingredients that are generally considered safe, we always recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before using any skincare products during pregnancy or while breastfeeding, as individual circumstances may vary.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this product twice daily - once in the morning and once in the evening. Apply after cleansing and toning, but before moisturizing. If you have sensitive skin, you may want to start with once daily application and gradually increase as your skin adjusts.

faqItems.question: How should I store this product?
faqItems.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly closed when not in use. Do not expose to extreme temperatures. For maximum potency, we recommend using the product within 12 months after opening.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users notice initial improvements in skin texture and hydration within 1-2 weeks of consistent use. More significant results, such as reduction in fine lines and improved firmness, typically become visible after 4-6 weeks of regular application. Individual results may vary depending on skin type and condition.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used in conjunction with other skincare products?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our product is formulated to work well with most skincare routines. It can be layered with other products, but we recommend applying from thinnest to thickest consistency. Allow each product to fully absorb before applying the next. If using with active ingredients like retinol or vitamin C, you may want to alternate usage times to prevent potential irritation.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: For the Day Cream, apply in the morning after cleansing and serum application. For the Night Cream, apply in the evening as the final step in your skincare routine. Both creams should be applied by gently massaging onto face and neck using upward motions.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Product Is Suitable For Most Skin Types, Including Normal, Oily, Dry, And Combination Skin. However, If You Have Sensitive Skin Or A Skin Condition, We Recommend Performing A Patch Test Before Using The Product All Over Your Face. Apply A Small Amount Of The Product To The Inside Of Your Elbow And Wait 24 Hours To Make Sure You Do Not Have An Allergic Reaction Or Irritation. If You Experience Any Discomfort, Discontinue Use Of The Product Immediately.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, use the Day Cream every morning and the Night Cream every evening. The Day Cream should be applied in the morning after cleansing and before sun exposure. The Night Cream should be applied in the evening as the final step in your skincare routine.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: Most users notice initial improvements in skin texture and hydration within 1 week of consistent use. More significant results, such as reduction in fine lines and improved firmness, typically become visible after 3-4 weeks of regular application. Individual results may vary depending on skin type and condition.

faqItems.question: What is the best way to use this product?
faqItems.answer: After cleansing, apply a generous layer of the mask to your face, avoiding the eye and lip areas. Leave on for 15-20 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. For best results, use 2-3 times per week.

faqItems.question: Can this product be used on all skin types?
faqItems.answer: Our Product Is Specially Formulated For Dry, Dehydrated, And Sensitive Skin Types. However, It Can Be Used By All Skin Types During Periods Of Dehydration Or Environmental Stress. If You Have Very Oily Skin, You May Want To Use It Less Frequently, Such As Once A Week.

faqItems.question: How often should I use this product?
faqItems.answer: For optimal results, we recommend using this mask 2-3 times per week. If you have extremely dry or dehydrated skin, you may use it more frequently, up to once daily as an intensive treatment. If you have normal to oily skin, 1-2 times per week may be sufficient.

faqItems.question: How long will it take to see results from using this product?
faqItems.answer: You should notice immediate hydration and softening effects after the first use. With consistent use over 2-3 weeks, you'll see more significant improvements in skin texture, moisture retention, and overall complexion.
